title: Handy joystick and more, v2.11.0
content:
FEATURES:
  - Handy joystick with these available actions:
     - Activate secondary color
     - Canvas flip
     - Activate tool's alternative mode
     - Black and white canvas
     - Please suggest more useful actions
  - Noise dithering

ENHANCEMENTS:
  - Quick eye dropper can turn on/off for both finger and pencil long-press
  - Gesture pad can be enabled in portrait mode
  - When the selection tool is selected, pencil double-tap will select a grid square
  - Gradient dithering is more fluent
  - Frame navigation looping
  - Added gradient generator to the gradient tool
